title: I'm really bad and looking for help

embed.description: Queens / Bronze 2 0LP / 135W 131L Win Ratio 51% / Graves - 20W 22L Win Ratio 48%, Gangplank - 20W 19L Win Ratio 51%, Lee Sin - 19W 16L Win Ratio 54%, Ryze - 11W 11L Win Ratio 50%, Ivern - 10W 7L Win Ratio 59%

body: Look I've been in bronze for about a year now and I can not get out. This because I'm complete trash and i have zero clue what to do. I hoping that some higher elo players can tell where I'm going wrong because i would love to improve and climb the ladder. Thanks to all that reply because i know i really need it.

replies.body: Add me and we can chat in game, Tìna. :)

um im alright but stil in bronze, you can add me and we can  climb in dou if you want. my summoner name is my name on this so

im a elise jg and a thresh main  but ugh looking into gettting renekton and hopefully maining someone on the top

Right I may not be high elo but If you need help there are videos on Youtube that shows someone Diamond/plat+ showing what you should do if you want to climb. 

P.S if you may not know- Always main atleast 2 champs and 2 lanes/roles. The better you get with the champs the higher the chances you can win your lane and carry.

EDIT: Umm main a few champs so the two that concidently got banned, you always have atleast another champ you can confidently play
